name: Video Tube
description: A simple UI for uploading and viewing videos, demonstrating efficient handling of media content with React , tailwind and Material library

name: Calculator
description: A basic and functional calculator built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, capable of performing standard arithmetic operations.

name: Clock
description: A digital clock displaying the current time, created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Cricket
description: An interactive game where users can play rock-paper-scissors against the computer, implemented with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

name: Roll Dics
description: A random number generation-based game where users roll a disc to achieve a target score, developed with Tailwind And React

name: New Techno
description: A visually appealing and user-friendly UI page showcasing modern design principles and responsive layout

name: Nike Landing Page
description: A sleek and professional landing page for Nike, highlighting products and brand aesthetics using React And Tailwind Css.

name: Password Genrator
description: A secure password generator tool that creates strong and random passwords, built with  Tailwind CSS and React.

name: Crypto App
description: A real-time cryptocurrency tracking app fetching data from the CoinGecko API, providing users with up-to-date market information.
